name: Bloody Bagger
description:
Fill Up the Bags of Blood

Rules:

  1. Bags are rounded at the bottom
  2. Bags must be filled from the bottom up
  3. The column number must match the number of filled sections
  4. The row number must match the number of filled sections
  5. Use logical deductions; don't guess!

Made for TriJam #90
Theme: Save a life
